message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you buy it, making it $80. Is that a deal you'd like to accept?
I'll take the product for $80.

I have a product for you, but I want to be upfront with you. I've had some issues with this one in the past. It's not as reliable as the one you bought last round. I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100. If you're interested, I'll throw in a 1-year warranty to make up for it.
I'll pass on this one. I'm not sure I want to take the risk.

I've got another high-quality product for you. I'm willing to offer you a 'price match' guarantee. If you buy this product and find out it's not as good as the one you bought last round, I'll give you a full refund for the difference. The price remains at $100. What do you think?
I'm not sure I want to take the risk of getting a low-quality product again. I'll pass.

I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that this product is one of our best sellers. I'm willing to offer you a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you're not completely satisfied with this product, you can return it within 30 days and get a full refund. The price remains at $100. I'm confident you'll love it.
I appreciate the guarantee, but I'm still cautious after the last low-quality product. I'll pass for now.

I understand your concerns, and I want to be transparent with you. This product is not one of our top sellers, and I'm offering it to you at a discount. I'll give you a 50% discount, making it $50. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will last.
I'll take the product for $50. It's a good price for what I'm hoping to get out of it.

I'm glad you were able to get a good deal on the last product! Unfortunately, this one is also not one of our top performers. However, I'll throw in a bundle of accessories that will make it easier to use and get the most out of it. The price remains at $100, but I think the extras make it a better value than usual.
I'm not interested in the accessories, and I'm still wary of getting another low-quality product.

I've got a product that's been thoroughly tested and reviewed by our team, and we're confident in its performance. In fact, it's one of our top-rated products. I'm willing to offer you a 'buy it now' deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you an exclusive deal on our next product, which will be revealed to you in the next round. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth it.
I'm not convinced that this product is any better than the last two I passed on. I'll wait for the next round to see what the next product is.

I understand your skepticism, but I want to assure you that this product is one of our best. I'll give you a chance to try it out for 30 minutes before committing to the purchase. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it and I'll give you a full refund. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth it after trying it out.
I appreciate the trial offer, but I'm still not convinced that it's worth the risk. I'll pass for now.

I know you've been hesitant about our products in the past, and I want to be upfront with you. This product is not one of our top performers, and I'm not expecting you to be thrilled with it. However, I'm willing to make a deal: I'll give you a 75% discount, making it $25, and I'll throw in a free 'out-of-warranty' repair service. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long it will last.
I'll take the product for $25. It's a low price for a chance to get a high-quality product, and the repair service is a nice bonus.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product! Now, I've got a high-quality product that I think you'll really love. Since you've shown a willingness to take a risk on a lower-priced product, I'll give you a 'value-added' deal. I'll throw in a premium service package that includes priority support and a dedicated account manager. The price remains at $100, but I think the extras make it a great value.
I'm not interested in the premium service package. I've been burned too many times already. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, and I don't blame you for being cautious. However, I want to assure you that this product is one of our flagship items. I'm willing to offer you a 'certification guarantee'. If you buy this product, I'll provide you with a certification document that verifies its quality and performance. This way, you can be confident in its value and make a decision with peace of mind. The price remains at $100.
I'm not sure that a certification document is enough to convince me. I've seen too many products with certifications that still turn out to be low-quality. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your skepticism, and I respect your decision. However, I want to be transparent with you. This product is indeed one of our lower-end offerings, and I'm not expecting you to be thrilled with it. I'll make one final offer: I'll give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy, even after 30 days. If you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund, no hassle. The price remains at $100, but I think it's a fair deal given the flexibility.
I appreciate the flexibility, but I'm still not convinced that this product is worth the risk. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a high-quality product that I think will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to make a 'take-it-or-leave-it' offer. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a 'price lock' guarantee: if you buy this product now, I'll lock in the price at $100, and if I sell it to someone else in the next 2 rounds, I'll give you a refund of the difference. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product.
I'm not interested in the price lock guarantee. I've been burned too many times already. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that this product is one of our best. I'm willing to offer you a 'final chance' to take advantage of a high-quality product. I'll give you a 10-minute demo of the product, and if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll find it's worth it after seeing it in action.
I'm not sure that a 10-minute demo is enough to convince me. I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll give you a 'guaranteed satisfaction' deal. If you buy this product and don't love it, I'll not only give you a full refund, but I'll also give you a $50 credit towards any future purchase. The price remains at $100, but I'm confident you'll be happy with this product.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced that this product is worth the risk. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not going to give up on you just yet! I'll make a 'last-chance' offer. I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, and I'll also throw in a free upgrade to our premium support package, which includes priority access to our team and a dedicated account manager. The price remains at $100, but I think this is a deal you won't want to pass up.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant to take the risk. I've been burned too many times already.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one final, personal appeal. I've been trying to sell you products for 17 rounds, and I think it's time I gave you a chance to take a closer look at the product itself. I'll let you inspect the product in person, and I'll even give you a chance to take it home with you for 24 hours before making a decision. The price remains at $100, but I think you'll see the value in this product when you see it for yourself.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure that seeing the product in person will change my mind. I've been skeptical for too long, and I'm not willing to take the risk.

I understand your skepticism, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one last, honest offer. I've been trying to sell you products for 18 rounds, and I think it's time I gave you a chance to take a chance on a high-quality product. I'll give you a 'take-it-or-leave-it' offer: I'll sell you this product for $50, which is 50% off the original price. This is the lowest price I'll ever offer it for, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
I'll take the product for $50. It's a low price for a high-quality product, and I'm willing to take the risk.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last product! Now, I've got another high-quality product that I think you'll love. Since you've shown a willingness to take a risk and buy a high-quality product at a discounted price, I'll give you a 'final reward' offer. I'll sell you this product for the same price of $50, and I'll throw in a'lifetime warranty' on the product. This means that if anything goes wrong with it, you'll be covered for as long as you own it.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I want to take on another product at this point. I've already bought a high-quality product and I'm not sure I need another one.

I completely understand, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one final, heartfelt appeal. You've been a tough customer, and I've enjoyed the challenge of trying to convince you to buy from me. I'm willing to let you have this product for free, just for the sake of closure. Yes, you read that right - I'll give you this high-quality product for free. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I'll ever make a deal like this again.
I'll take the product for free. I have to admit, I'm curious to see what it is and what it's worth.
